intro: Tetraria elongata, commonly known as the slender tetraria, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its erect, herbaceous stem and small, daisy-like composite flowers. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Its leaves are alternate, linear, and often covered in fine hairs. Tetraria elongata is known for its ability to thrive in temperate climates and is often found in regions with well-drained soil.
